com.algolia.instantsearch.model

Class SearchBoxViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.algolia.instantsearch.model.SearchBoxViewModel

  • public class SearchBoxViewModel
extends Object
    Handles the logic for linking any kind of SearchView to one or several InstantSearch.
